fields.name: Ohmwrecker
fields.description: +300 Health +50 Armor +100% Base Health Regen +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Active: Prevents nearby enemy turrets from attacking for 3 seconds (120 second cooldown). This effect cannot be used against the same turret more than once every 8 seconds. UNIQUE Passive - Point Runner: Builds up to +30% Movement Speed over 2 seconds while near turrets (including fallen turrets).
